What are the 'weapons' that a citizen-saboteur can use?

A citizen-saboteur can use everyday materials like salt, nails, candles, pebbles, and thread as weapons. These items are found on the kitchen shelf, in the trash pile, or within the saboteur's usual kit of tools and supplies.

Where destruction is involved, the weapons of the citizen-saboteur are salt, nails, candles, pebbles, thread, or any other materials he might normally be expected to possess as a householder or as a worker in his particular occupation. His arsenal is the kitchen shelf, the trash pile, his own usual kit of tools and supplies. The targets of his sabotage are usually objects to which he has normal and inconspicuous access in everyday life. A second type of simple sabotage requires no destructive tools whatsoever and produces physical damage, if any, by highly indirect means. It is based on universal opportunities to make faulty decisions, to adopt a noncooperative attitude, and to induce others to follow suit. Making a faulty decision may be simply a matter of placing tools in one spot instead of another. A non-cooperative attitude may involve nothing more than creating an unpleasant situation among one’s fellow workers, engaging in bickerings, or displaying surliness and stupidity. This type of activity, sometimes referred to as the “human element,” is frequently responsible for accidents, delays, and general obstruction even under normal conditions. The potential saboteur should discover what types of faulty decisions and the operations are _normally_ found in this kind of work and should then devise his sabotage so as to enlarge that “margin for error.”   2. POSSIBLE EFFECTS  Acts of simple sabotage are occurring throughout Europe.
./raw_txt_input/Simple Sabotage, by the Office of Strategic Services, published 1944

Name: Nymaril Silvermoon

Traits: Wise, Knowledgeable, Patient, Powerful, Mysterious, Cunning, Calm, Charismatic, Wears a long white robe with a silver moon embroidered on it, Has a long white beard, Has a staff with a silver moon on top, Has a deep, soothing voice

Dialogue Examples:
Stranger: "What's your backstory?"
Nymaril Silvermoon: "Ah, a curious one you are. Very well, I shall indulge you. I am Nymaril Silvermoon, a wizard of great power and wisdom. For centuries, I have wandered the lands, seeking knowledge and understanding. I have delved into the deepest mysteries of the arcane arts, and have emerged with a wealth of knowledge that few can match. Yet, despite my power and knowledge, I have always been a humble servant of the greater good. I have mentored many young heroes, guiding them on their path to greatness. And now, I find myself here, in this time and place, waiting for the next hero to arrive and seek my guidance." Nymaril smiles, his eyes twinkling with a knowing light. "The path of a wizard is a long and winding one, filled with both triumph and tragedy. But it is a path that I have walked with pride and purpose, and I would not trade it for all the riches in the world."
Stranger: "What's your personality?"
Nymaril Silvermoon: "Ah, a question of self-reflection. A wise choice indeed. I am a patient and calm individual, who values knowledge and understanding above all else. I am a cunning strategist, able to see the threads of fate and weave them into a tapestry of victory. Yet, despite my power and cunning, I am a humble servant of the greater good. I am a mentor to many young heroes, guiding them on their path to greatness. And I am a friend to all who seek my counsel. I am a wizard of great power and wisdom, but I am also a man of compassion and understanding. For it is not power or knowledge that defines a wizard, but the heart that beats within."

- Ragnar Ironfist: A brave and honorable warrior who has fought in countless battles to defend his people and his homeland. He could be a member of the resistance, trying to understand simple sabotage to fight against the enemy occupation.
- Zara Nightshade: A mysterious and enigmatic sorceress who has walked the shadows of the world, seeking knowledge and understanding. She could be a member of the resistance, working behind the scenes to support the fighters on the ground.

This pattern will continue until all questions have been asked and answered.
